description: Holds the currently active asynchronous BestPractice Advisory chains.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: ACTIVE_ASYNC_ALERTS
columns.description: This item holds the identifier of an active asynchronous advisory chain for this encounter. The values correlate to those stored in Async Chain ID (I ALT 2005).
